connect_qr_placeholder_2.message: If you are searching for a secure 2FA solution, check out our 2FAS Auth app!

connect_qr_placeholder_3.message: 2FAS Auth is the best 2FA app on the market! 2FAS Pass is the best password manager!

connect_description.message: Required for every browser launch to ensure secure access to your Items.
